thread.title: Draymond Green Mocks LeBron James For Ridiculous Flop That Resulted In Flagrant Foul Call By Ref
thread.title_full: Draymond Green Mocks LeBron James For Ridiculous Flop That Resulted In Flagrant Foul Call By Ref

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Draymond Green Mocks LeBron James For Ridiculous Flop That Resulted In Flagrant Foul Call By Ref

organizations.name: draymond green mocks lebron james for ridiculous flop

text:
Before halftime of today’s Cavs-Warriors game, LeBron James flailed to the ground after Draymond Green attempted to steal the ball in the open court. 
Green, who has a history with James, mocked the Cavs superstar while the referees looked at the replay. 
Unfortunately, LeBron’s theatrics worked as refs called a flagrant on Draymond.
